page.title: 05SMUGGLERS INN,ST.ERTH CONT'D
page.content: On most of the walls at the Smugglers Inn there are murals of smugglers. These were painted by a local artist whose nick-name was Skip. They have an African Grey Parrot called Percy which sometimes talks. The pub is known throughout the world for its jazz performances on Sundays. There are discos,singing and pub games,for example,snooker,darts and pool.There are arcade games and a juke-box. The customers who spend time in the four bars and restaurant are local people and some holiday makers. The tourists sleep in the old part but not many people stay there as it is not in one of the major resorts.
